The world of cats

Tw by: Dendesam Wedi Dendas - June 15, 2017
  • Today's events Posted: June 16, 2017
  • The world of cats Posted: June 15, 2017
  • This is the title of the post Posted: June 12, 2017

Cats are wonderful creatures. They like to keep themselves mostly clean. The clean their mouthes after each meal. They also like to groom themleves. Having ceaten and cleaned themselves up

they will spend most of the day time sleeping. Then, towards the evening, they like to get out and explore their surroundings, marking territory.
Cats and dogs are mostly enemies. But, if properly trained, thye make good friends. It is the dog will leans quickly to tolerate the cat however. The cat will continue playing tricks on the poor dog.

Additional information, and maybe a Link or two
